tool_description: This text to text api allows you to translate any language to English
name: Translate Any language to English
title: Translate Any language to English

api_list.name: Text to Text
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-any-language-to-english.p.rapidapi.com/api/english/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-any-language-to-english.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://translate-any-language-to-english.p.rapidapi.com/api/english/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "translate-any-language-to-english.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
